scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:EventsPanel_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($eventsListId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('eventsList')) #set ($searchInputId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('searchInput')) #set ($machineNamesId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('machineNames')) #set ($eventTypesId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('eventTypes')) #set ($eventCountId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('eventCount')) #set ($headerTemplateId = $core_v2_widget.UniqueId('listHeaderTemplate')) #set ($initialStartDate = $core_v2_utility.CurrentUserDate.AddDays(-7))

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Instructions')

$core_v2_language.GetResource('between') $core_v2_language.GetResource('and') #set ($machineNames = $context.ListMachineNames()) #if($machineNames.Count >= 2)
#end $core_v2_language.GetResource('Refresh')

    #set ($inProcess = true) #set ($options = "%{ StartDate = '$initialStartDate', EndDate = '$initialEndDate', PageSize = 20, PageIndex = 0 }") #set ($events = $context.ListEvents($options)) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('render-list.vm')
#registerClientTemplate($headerTemplateId)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('ExportAll')
#end #registerEndOfPageHtml('eventsPanel') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="after">after</resource> <resource name="and">and</resource> <resource name="between">that occurred between</resource> <resource name="cancel">Cancel</resource> <resource name="containing">containing</resource> <resource name="Event">Event</resource> <resource name="Events_Plural">{0} Events</resource> <resource name="Events_Singular">{0} Event</resource> <resource name="EventsPanel_Description">View platform events.</resource> <resource name="EventsPanel_Name">Events</resource> <resource name="Export">Export as CSV</resource> <resource name="ExportAll">Export Filtered as CSV</resource> <resource name="Instructions">Below is a listing of events occurring throughout the site.</resource> <resource name="more">More</resource> <resource name="Node_Any">on any node</resource> <resource name="NoResults">No events match the filter.</resource> <resource name="on">on</resource> <resource name="Refresh">Refresh</resource> <resource name="Type_All">All events</resource> <resource name="Type_Debug">Debug events</resource> <resource name="Type_Error">Error events</resource> <resource name="Type_Information">Information events</resource> <resource name="Type_Warning">Warning events</resource> <resource name="UserAgent">User Agent</resource> </language>
